verses.verse: O give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>; call <S%H7121><s%> upon his name <S%H8034><s%>: make known <S%H3045><s%> his deeds <S%H5949><s%> among the people <S%H5971><s%>.
Sing <S%H7891><s%> unto him, sing psalms <S%H2167><s%> unto him: talk <S%H7878><s%> ye of all his wondrous works <S%H6381><s%>.
Glory <S%H1984><s%> ye in his holy <S%H6944><s%> name <S%H8034><s%>: let the heart <S%H3820><s%> of them rejoice <S%H8055><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.
Seek <S%H1875><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, and his strength <S%H5797><s%>: seek <S%H1245><s%> his face <S%H6440><s%> evermore <S%H8548><s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> his marvellous works <S%H6381><s%> that he hath done <S%H6213><s%>; his wonders <S%H4159><s%>, and the judgments <S%H4941><s%> of his mouth <S%H6310><s%>;
O ye seed <S%H2233><s%> of Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>, ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his chosen <S%H972><s%>.
He is the LORD <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%>: his judgments <S%H4941><s%> are in all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He hath remembered <S%H2142><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, the word <S%H1697><s%> which he commanded <S%H6680><s%> to a thousand <S%H505><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Which covenant he made <S%H3772><s%> with Abraham <S%H85><s%>, and his oath <S%H7621><s%> unto Isaac <S%H3446><s%>;
And confirmed <S%H5975><s%> the same unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for a law <S%H2706><s%>, and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%>:
Saying <S%H559><s%>, Unto thee will I give <S%H5414><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan <S%H3667><s%>, the lot <S%H2256><s%> of your inheritance <S%H5159><s%>: lot: Heb. cord
When they were but a few men <S%H4962><s%> in number <S%H4557><s%>; yea, very few <S%H4592><s%>, and strangers <S%H1481><s%> in it.
When they went <S%H1980><s%> from one nation <S%H1471><s%> to another, from one kingdom <S%H4467><s%> to another <S%H312><s%> people <S%H5971><s%>;
He suffered <S%H3240><s%> no man <S%H120><s%> to do them wrong <S%H6231><s%>: yea, he reproved <S%H3198><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> for their sakes;
Saying, Touch <S%H5060><s%> not mine anointed <S%H4899><s%>, and do my prophets <S%H5030><s%> no harm <S%H7489><s%>.
Moreover he called <S%H7121><s%> for a famine <S%H7458><s%> upon the land <S%H776><s%>: he brake <S%H7665><s%> the whole staff <S%H4294><s%> of bread <S%H3899><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, even Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, who was sold <S%H4376><s%> for a servant <S%H5650><s%>:
Whose feet <S%H7272><s%> they hurt <S%H6031><s%> with fetters <S%H3525><s%>: he <S%H5315><s%> was laid <S%H935><s%> in iron <S%H1270><s%>: he: Heb. his soul came into iron
Until the time <S%H6256><s%> that his word <S%H1697><s%> came <S%H935><s%>: the word <S%H565><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> tried <S%H6884><s%> him.
The king <S%H4428><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> and loosed <S%H5425><s%> him; even the ruler <S%H4910><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>, and let him go free <S%H6605><s%>.
He made <S%H7760><s%> him lord <S%H113><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%>, and ruler <S%H4910><s%> of all his substance <S%H7075><s%>: substance: Heb. possession
To bind <S%H631><s%> his princes <S%H8269><s%> at his pleasure <S%H5315><s%>; and teach his senators <S%H2205><s%> wisdom <S%H2449><s%>.
Israel <S%H3478><s%> also came <S%H935><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>; and Jacob <S%H3290><s%> sojourned <S%H1481><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>.
And he increased <S%H6509><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> greatly <S%H3966><s%>; and made them stronger <S%H6105><s%> than their enemies <S%H6862><s%>.
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their heart <S%H3820><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%>, to deal subtilly <S%H5230><s%> with his servants <S%H5650><s%>.
He sent <S%H7971><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>; and Aaron <S%H175><s%> whom he had chosen <S%H977><s%>.
They shewed <S%H7760><s%> his signs <S%H226><s%> <S%H1697><s%> among them, and wonders <S%H4159><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Ham <S%H2526><s%>. his: Heb. words of his signs
He sent <S%H7971><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%>, and made it dark <S%H2821><s%>; and they rebelled <S%H4784><s%> not against his word <S%H1697><s%>.
He turned <S%H2015><s%> their waters <S%H4325><s%> into blood <S%H1818><s%>, and slew <S%H4191><s%> their fish <S%H1710><s%>.
Their land <S%H776><s%> brought forth <S%H8317><s%> frogs <S%H6854><s%> in abundance <S%H8317><s%>, in the chambers <S%H2315><s%> of their kings <S%H4428><s%>.
He spake <S%H559><s%>, and there came <S%H935><s%> divers sorts of flies <S%H6157><s%>, and lice <S%H3654><s%> in all their coasts <S%H1366><s%>.
He gave <S%H5414><s%> them hail <S%H1259><s%> for rain <S%H1653><s%>, and flaming <S%H3852><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>. them: Heb. their rain hail
He smote <S%H5221><s%> their vines <S%H1612><s%> also and their fig trees <S%H8384><s%>; and brake <S%H7665><s%> the trees <S%H6086><s%> of their coasts <S%H1366><s%>.
He spake <S%H559><s%>, and the locusts <S%H697><s%> came <S%H935><s%>, and caterpillers <S%H3218><s%>, and that without number <S%H4557><s%>,
And did eat up <S%H398><s%> all the herbs <S%H6212><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, and devoured <S%H398><s%> the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their ground <S%H127><s%>.
He smote <S%H5221><s%> also all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in their land <S%H776><s%>, the chief <S%H7225><s%> of all their strength <S%H202><s%>.
He brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> also with silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold <S%H2091><s%>: and there was not one feeble <S%H3782><s%> person among their tribes <S%H7626><s%>.
Egypt <S%H4714><s%> was glad <S%H8055><s%> when they departed <S%H3318><s%>: for the fear <S%H6343><s%> of them fell <S%H5307><s%> upon them.
He spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloud <S%H6051><s%> for a covering <S%H4539><s%>; and fire <S%H784><s%> to give light <S%H215><s%> in the night <S%H3915><s%>.
The people asked <S%H7592><s%>, and he brought <S%H935><s%> quails <S%H7958><s%>, and satisfied <S%H7646><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of heaven <S%H8064><s%>.
He opened <S%H6605><s%> the rock <S%H6697><s%>, and the waters <S%H4325><s%> gushed out <S%H2100><s%>; they ran <S%H1980><s%> in the dry places <S%H6723><s%> like a river <S%H5104><s%>.
For he remembered <S%H2142><s%> his holy <S%H6944><s%> promise <S%H1697><s%>, and Abraham <S%H85><s%> his servant <S%H5650><s%>.
And he brought forth <S%H3318><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> with joy <S%H8342><s%>, and his chosen <S%H972><s%> with gladness <S%H7440><s%>: gladness: Heb. singing
And gave <S%H5414><s%> them the lands <S%H776><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>: and they inherited <S%H3423><s%> the labour <S%H5999><s%> of the people <S%H3816><s%>;
That they might observe <S%H8104><s%> his statutes <S%H2706><s%>, and keep <S%H5341><s%> his laws <S%H8451><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> ye the LORD <S%H3050><s%>. Praise: Heb. Hallelujah
